content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the defendant had to pay various fees including stamp duty professional fees and court fees the case involved the division of matrimonial property and credit obligations the defendant and thirdparty creditors raised objections to the applicants claims the applicant sought the dissolution of the marriage recognition of liabilities declaration of debts and division of property the court granted the applicants claim for the childrens residence and maintenance arrears the court also allowed the dissolution of the marriage and determined the responsibilities of both parties regarding a consumer credit loan agreement and a tax obligation the defendant was ordered to pay various fees to the state budget

metadata.cost: 109.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 372.72 EUR (professional fees) + 13.43 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
